website_summaries.verdict: For many, I think the convenience of the Ball Freshtech Automatic Home Canning System will be worth the price. It's a fantastic starter kit and a great option for experienced canners who want to complete a batch in less time.
pros: The Ball Freshtech Automatic Home Canning System speeds up the food preservation process
It also employs safety technology that protects against unsavory bacterial contamination
cons: The $299.99 price is pretty steep, especially compared with traditional "techless" water-bath canning techniques
For safety reasons, you can't use your own recipes or alter the ones Ball provides

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I do some hand embroidery and love this tread, it's my go to! Great quality
customer_reviews.author: Francesca Petrizzo

customer_reviews.title: Love the color
customer_reviews.text: This color is beautiful! I am still waiting on the yellow, but this one I received was the orange one. I was very leery because I could not see the color up close and I needed a bright orange. The only thing (and it is my fault for a lack of knowledge) is it is smaller than I thought it was-I may need to order more, but it is affordable and worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Waco#1

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: As described. This pearl cotton makes needlepoint easy because there are no separating strands. It was my first experience with Pearl cotton instead of the DMC 6 strand floss. It's so much more simple!
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: Soft and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This tiny ball has a lot of thread! I used it to bind a small quilt and have plenty left over for other projects. I really like the weight of the thread, perfect for anything.
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: Pretty thread
customer_reviews.text: I’m hand quilting a baby blanket. This looks so nice quilting it with this thread. It stands out & is a little shiny. Makes a beautiful quilt!
customer_reviews.author: Hummingbird lover

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works as it is supposed to and good thread for re-enforcing buttons
customer_reviews.author: Chris Sheehy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for more decorative quilting.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for more decorative quilting. Make sure you use a needle with a large eye or use a needle threader.
customer_reviews.author: Bella's Mom

customer_reviews.title: wonderful thread
customer_reviews.text: make my project look exactly the way I expected very nice.
customer_reviews.author: nancy welch

customer_reviews.title: Perfect color
customer_reviews.text: I could not find this color of pearl cotton in any of the stores that carry DMC pearl cotton. It's ridiculous that the craft and sewing stores only carried about 5 colors! I am so glad I could buy this here because I have a project to finish with this color.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great I use them to wrap smoke cleansing bundles
customer_reviews.author: Noura

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: After what I saw that I received for the price...I wasn't worth it. I won't order embroidery thread online ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Michaela Marineau

customer_reviews.title: Embroidery thread
customer_reviews.text: I have used this embroidery thread for years and like it very much. It arrived promptly and I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Gail L.

customer_reviews.title: love the thread
customer_reviews.text: i use it for most of my embroidering needs. the color is really black and dependable. color fast washable too.
customer_reviews.author: Nadine Russo

customer_reviews.title: No-I do not wish to.This was in response to your question.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a friend and since it wasn't for me and I didn't use it, I really in all honesty can't rate this item.However, the friend that I gave it too was very excited about it.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Hoekstra

customer_reviews.title: Pearl cotton comes in an array of colors
customer_reviews.text: Craft stores only carried Pearl cotton in white & ecru. I was glad to find this in orange & also ordered grey. Great brand!
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product if you are looking to make your own books (that is what I use it for). I haven't used it for anything else so I can't say if it is good or not in that area but it seems to hold up quite well since a classmate and me both use this product.
customer_reviews.author: NiceToKnow6000

customer_reviews.title: THREAD, NOT YARN!
customer_reviews.text: This thread is Beautiful. I love the color. Unfortunately, I misread the listing and thought I was buying yarn, but the product itself is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use the pearl cotton threads on some of my hand made cards.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted to start quilting my quilt. It arrived just as expected and I finished my quilt with plenty to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Alison B. Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Nice thread
customer_reviews.text: The thread is of good quality and suited our purpose nicely
customer_reviews.author: Mark Twain

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use this stuff to quilt and I love it! Color was exactly what I wanted!!
customer_reviews.author: Loulou

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I use this thread for certain hand quilting projects and I am pleased with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Donald  and Sandra Kohn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product but it's only one ball not the whole box
customer_reviews.author: dawynanic jones

customer_reviews.title: can't go wrong having this around
customer_reviews.text: A sewing staple that is good quality and nice to have.
customer_reviews.author: Jane L.

customer_reviews.title: Quality means DMC
customer_reviews.text: DMC is the premier name in stitching threads. A definite go-to when you want quality.
customer_reviews.author: Reberle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: You can always count on the quality of DMC threads. Color is always consistent throughout.
customer_reviews.author: Crafty

customer_reviews.title: What took so long???
customer_reviews.text: I ordered three other colors but it took 3 weeks to get this ONE color. What gives? It says DMC, but does not feel like it. Wondering if this is another knock off???
customer_reviews.author: LifeIsShort

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Colored Thread
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a wedding project. Product is great but it's thread, not what I thought. That's on me. The color is exactly what I needed. Great for cross stitch and similar projects. Bought several balls. They are about as big as a golf ball. Was a little taken aback that the shipping dept used a box that I could fit no less than three board games of clue in to ship 9 golf ball sized balls of thread. But maybe they were short on small boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Morgen

customer_reviews.title: Quality thread.
customer_reviews.text: Love this thread. I found it easy to use and I could easily thread it. I quilted a queen size quilt and loved using this thread. I am an older woman and could not use quilting thread and needle, so I found this thread and used embroidery needle. Worked great and my grandson loved his quilt.
customer_reviews.author: Grams!

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent DMC quality, as usual. This is a big ball of floss, color is 666 bright red (which always gives me a good chuckle).
customer_reviews.author: taptrap12Top Contributor: Cross-Stitch

customer_reviews.title: Tiny spool
customer_reviews.text: I am honestly shocked at what a small spool this is! I’ve paid less for large rolls of thread and I’m very disappointed in what I received. I highly recommend shopping with other suppliers, you can get great quality and a lot more thread for your money.
customer_reviews.author: AmyLynn

customer_reviews.title: Very small skein of thread
customer_reviews.text: The small size of this ball of thread was a shock....it is tiny. The photo is misleading. Not a good value for my money. Disappointing. It was a nice color though.
customer_reviews.author: P. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Not so much
customer_reviews.text: While the Variegated colors are pretty, I would not recommend them because the thread feels thinner than a solid color DMC #8 perle cotton. I don't know why that is, but I am returning several.
customer_reviews.author: CindyRB

customer_reviews.title: Just what it says
customer_reviews.text: It's 6 thread count DMC, but it is a silky slippery type of thread and not the usual kind you'd use for embroidery/cross-stitch if that's what you're looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant color
customer_reviews.text: It's a gorgeous color and nice quality. It took a month to receive it from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: MelrM

customer_reviews.title: The best kind of embroidery thread
customer_reviews.text: I like the continuous roll and the texture of the thread
customer_reviews.author: Susan M.H.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in two packages.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how I received the pearl cotton in two packages, however, they arrived just in time. Using them to complete an embroidery for a quilt.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Burt

customer_reviews.title: Just the color I needed!
customer_reviews.text: This must be a popular color because it always seems sold out in my local craft stores. I am using it for embroidery and cords for embroidered pieces. I am sure the quality if great because it is DMC.
customer_reviews.author: OAH

customer_reviews.title: the thread is the best for quilting
customer_reviews.text: Working on a tee-shirt quilt, the thread is the best for quilting, the color is vibrant and the quilt is coming along great!!!! J.Dolan
customer_reviews.author: Jo-Ann Dolan

customer_reviews.title: Small but excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: There was very little provided however it was enough for my project. Thick and durable thread.
customer_reviews.author: Jaq&jake

customer_reviews.title: and its colors are beautiful. I've experimented with other brand thread
customer_reviews.text: DMC Pearl Cotton thread is my GO TO thread for all my needlepoint projects. It is strong, color-safe, very smooth to the touch, and its colors are beautiful. I've experimented with other brand thread, but none compare favorably. If I can get DMC, that's what I use.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Woman

customer_reviews.title: I will not purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money, tiny little spool so disappointed for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Mary J.

customer_reviews.title: It seems sturdy and has a nice sheen to
customer_reviews.text: This product is as described. It seems sturdy and has a nice sheen to it
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Did not serve my purpose
customer_reviews.text: While the product is fine, it is not what I thought it was. I needed a heavier thread for the project I was doing.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Sipos

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this thread to embroider with. I dont have to split the threads.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Begiebing

customer_reviews.title: Fast company and great products!
customer_reviews.text: Hey! it is DMC and it is exactly what you would expect from such a tried and true company.....thank you!
customer_reviews.author: None

customer_reviews.title: Pearl cotton perfect size and color
customer_reviews.text: I was in need of a specific color and size of pearl cotton thread and was able to get it from Amazon. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Becki316

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: color matched perfectly so I could finish the quilt I started!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: DMC Pearl Cotton Ball Size 8 87yd, Variegated Violet
product_meta.description: Color:Variegated VioletEDI: Pearl Cotton Balls. These balls of highly mercerized cotton are lustrous, non-divisible and made of 100% cotton. Perfect for Cross Stitching, Needlepoint and Embroidery on a wide variety of fabrics when a rich raised pattern is desired and for the finest of crocheted lace. Size 8. Length: 95yd (87m).
feature_bullets: This pearl cotton thread balls is soft, silky, does not fluff or kink
Made of 100 percent long fiber cotton finest
This thread have double mercerising which gives it its beautiful pearlised sheen
After washing, wrap the embroidery in a towel to remove excess water, then dry flat

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars282 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
